name: Midnight Museum Heist (GGJ Edition)
description:
In this little two-player online game, one player has to make sure an important work of art gets mysteriously "lost" from the museum collection, while the other one tries to prevent that crime from happening. Enjoy the thievery!

This game was created during the Global Game Jam 2021 with the theme of "Lost and Found".

Special thanks (and attribution) to:

Geoffrey Marchal for the great Archduke Albert and  Tissot bust and the incredible Ptolemaic, Vulcan and du Bois statue scans.

C. Yamathata, Jan Kikolai Nelles & Nohra Al-Badri for great looking the Nefertiti bust scan.
Abby Gancz for the brilliant Ramesses III statue scan.

Sebastian Sosnowski for the cool model of an oil painting.

And finally,  the wonderful elevator music by none other than Kevin Macleod.
